to.shell_command:
osascript -e '                        
                        set the clipboard to "Let’s check this in!

Run this in a single command:
git add . && git commit -m “add a good message here” , just use mutliple “-m”

then, after a successful commit, git push"
                        tell application "System Events"
                                keystroke "v" using command down
                        end tell
                        delay 0.1
                        tell application "System Events"
                                keystroke return
                        end tell
                        '

osascript -e '                        
                        set fileContents to do shell script "cat " & quoted form of "/Users/johnlindquist/.config/snippets/git-diff-then-commit.txt"
                        set the clipboard to fileContents
                        tell application "System Events"
                                keystroke "v" using command down
                        end tell
                        delay 0.1
                        tell application "System Events"
                                keystroke return
                        end tell
                        '
